Properties.ProtectedString:
ball = script.Parent
HitSound = Instance.new("Sound") HitSound.Name = "HitSound" HitSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=11945266" HitSound.Parent = ball HitSound.Volume = 1
function onTouched(hit) if hit == nil or hit.Parent == nil then return end local humanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid") local hasDanceAlready = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Dancinator")
if hasDanceAlready then return end
if humanoid ~= nil then HitSound:Play() dancinator = script.Dancinator dancinator.Parent = hit.Parent dancinator.Disabled = false connection:disconnect() ball.Parent:remove() end
-- HitSound:Play() -- ball.Parent = nil --print("Hit Ground At: ") --print(ball.Position) --ball.Parent = nil end
connection = ball.Touched:connect(onTouched)
wait(6) ball.Parent:remove()

local myChar = script.Parent if script.Parent ~= nil then local myHum = script.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHum ~= nil then newAnim = myHum:LoadAnimation(script.Boogie) newAnim:Play() end script.BoogieSound:Play() if myHum ~= nil then wait(4) myHum.Sit = true myTorso = script.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") local newBG = nil if myTorso ~= nil then newBG = Instance.new("BodyGyro") newBG.P = 100000 newBG.maxTorque = Vector3.new(newBG.P, newBG.P, newBG.P) newBG.cframe = myTorso.CFrame newBG.Parent = myTorso end wait(1) myHum.Sit = false if newBG ~= nil then newBG:remove() end end end
wait(3)
script:remove()

local dGun = script.Parent
--This call will cause a "wait" until the data comes back local error = true local danceBomb = nil while danceBomb == nil do error = false danceBomb = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(45914702)
local instances = danceBomb:GetChildren() if #instances == 0 then danceBomb:Remove() print("could not create dancebomb") error = true danceBomb = nil else danceBomb = danceBomb:FindFirstChild("DanceBomb") end --local missile = root:Clone() wait() end
danceBomb.Parent = nil -- should keep DanceBomb model only in memory
-- we had to anchor the parts initially, so they don't accidentally get killed, but now that the model is held in memory, we can remove the anchoring danceBomb.DanceBall.Anchored = false danceBomb.MusicBall.Anchored = false
dGun.Enabled = true
function gunUp() dGun.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, -.940, 0.342) dGun.GripRight = Vector3.new(-1, 0, 0) dGun.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, -.342, .940) end
function gunDown() dGun.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, -1, 0) dGun.GripRight = Vector3.new(-1, 0, 0) dGun.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) end
function fire(dPos) local vCharacter = dGun.Parent if vCharacter == nil or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") == nil then return end local vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
local spawnPos = vCharacter.PrimaryPart.Position
spawnPos = spawnPos + dPos.unit*10 --dPos = dPos - dPos.unit * 10
local missile = danceBomb:Clone()
missile.MusicBall.CFrame=CFrame.new(spawnPos) missile.DanceBall.CFrame=CFrame.new(spawnPos) missile.MusicBall.Velocity = dPos.unit * 17 missile.DanceBall.Velocity = dPos.unit * 17 missile.MusicBall.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0, 20 - math.random(0, 1)*40, 0) missile.DanceBall.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0, 20 - math.random(0, 1)*40, 0)
local missileFloat = Instance.new("BodyForce") missileFloat.force = Vector3.new(0, (missile.DanceBall:GetMass() + missile.MusicBall:GetMass()) * 196.1, 0)
local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = vPlayer creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = missile.DanceBall
local new_script = script.Parent.DanceBlast:clone() new_script.Disabled = false new_script.Parent = missile.DanceBall
missile.Parent = game.Workspace missile.DanceBall.MusicBallScript.Disabled = false missileFloat.Parent = missile.DanceBall
confettiBang = dGun.Handle:FindFirstChild("ConfettiBang") if confettiBang ~= nil then confettiBang.Volume = .6 confettiBang:Play() end end
function onActivated() if not dGun.Enabled then return end dGun.Enabled = false
local character = dGun.Parent; local humanoid = character.Humanoid if humanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") dGun.Enabled = true return end
local reload = 4 local targetPos = humanoid.TargetPoint local lookAt = (targetPos - character.Head.Position).unit gunUp() fire(lookAt) wait(.2) gunDown() wait(reload)
confettiBang = dGun.Handle:FindFirstChild("ConfettiBang") if confettiBang ~= nil then confettiBang.Volume = 0 end
dGun.Enabled = true end
script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated)

local Tool = script.Parent;
local stillEquipped = true function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
while stillEquipped do mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png"
while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(.01) end
mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png"
while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)
